mapper.select: SELECT s108b.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , s108b.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , s108b.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , s108b.SN /* 일련번호 */ , s108b.MRTG_KND_DCD /* 담보종류구분코드 */ , s002b.CD_VL_NM AS MRTG_KND_DCD_NM /* 담보종류구분코드명 */ , s108b.MRTG_RSN_CNTS /* 담보사유내용 */ , s108b.MRTG_EVL_AMT /* 담보평가금액 */ , s108b.RGT_RNK_DCD /* 권리순위구분코드 */ , s004b.CD_VL_NM AS RGT_RNK_DCD_NM /* 권리순위구분코드명 */ , s108b.MRTG_DTLS_DCD /* 담보상세구분코드 */ , s003b.CD_VL_NM AS MRTG_DTLS_DCD_NM /* 담보상세구분코드명 */ , s108b.MRTG_ACQST_STM_DCD /* 담보취득방식구분코드 */ , s005b.CD_VL_NM AS MRTG_ACQST_STM_DCD_NM /* 담보취득방식구분코드명 */ , s108b.MRTG_ACQST_DTLS_DCD /* 담보취득상세구분코드 */ , s006b.CD_VL_NM AS MRTG_ACQST_DTLS_DCD_NM /* 담보취득상세구분코드명 */ , s108b.INVST_CRNCY_CD /* 투자통화코드 */ , s007b.CD_VL_NM AS INVST_CRNCY_CD_NM /* 투자통화코드명 */ , s108b.CRNCY_AMT /* 통화금액 */ , s108b.APLC_EXCH_R /* 적용환율 */ , s108b.HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , s108b.HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , s108b.HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , s108b.HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래id */ , s108b.GUID /* guid */ FROM IBIMS108B s108b LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b ON s002b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'M007' /* 담보종류구분코드 */ AND s108b.MRTG_KND_DCD = s002b.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s003b ON s003b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'M005' /* 담보상세구분코드 */ AND s108b.MRTG_DTLS_DCD = s003b.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s004b ON s004b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'M005' /* 권리순위구분코드 */ AND s108b.MRTG_DTLS_DCD = s004b.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s005b ON s005b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'M003' /* 담보취득방식구분코드 */ AND s108b.MRTG_ACQST_STM_DCD = s005b.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s006b ON s006b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'M002' /* 담보취득상세구분코드 */ AND s108b.MRTG_ACQST_DTLS_DCD = s006b.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s007b ON s007b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' /* 투자통화코드 */ AND s108b.INVST_CRNCY_CD = s007b.CD_VL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND s108b.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND s108b.MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd} AND s108b.JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} ORDER BY SN
